getCommonUnit

public int getCommonUnit()
Specified by:
getCommonUnit in interface Measure
Returns:
a commonly-used unit used by this measure. NOTE that this is only a convenience and should not be depended on for computational use, since the notion of a common unit is extremely dependent on context.

getMaxUnit

public int getMaxUnit()
Specified by:
getMaxUnit in interface Measure
Returns:
the value of the highest-valued unit known by this measure. There is no implied relationship between "highest valued" unit and "size" of that unit.

getUnitName

public java.lang.String getUnitName(int unit)
Description copied from interface: Measure
The result is undefined if the unit is not valid for this measure class.

Specified by:
getUnitName in interface Measure
Parameters:
unit - to get name of
Returns:
the name of the unit specified.
